Question:
In each of the following questions find out the alternative which will replace the question mark.

Conference : Chairman :: Newspaper : ?


A. Reporter
B. Distributor
C. Printer
D. Editor
Solution: As Chairman is the highest authority in a conference similarly Editor is in Newspaper.

Question:
In each of the following questions find out the alternative which will replace the question mark.

Safe : Secure :: Protect : ?


A. Lock
B. Sure
C. Guard
D. Conserve
Solution: As safe ans secure have same meaning in the same way protect and guard have same meaning.

Question:

Master : OCUVGT :: LABOUR : ?


A. NCDQWT

D. NEDRWT

In each of the following questions find out the alternative which will replace the question mark.

Microphone : Loud :: Microscope : ?


A. Elongate
B. Investigate
C. Magnify
D. Examine
Solution: As Microphone makes sound louder similarly Microscope makes the object magnified.

Question:
In each of the following questions find out the alternative which will replace the question mark.

Melt : Liquid :: Freeze : ?


A. Ice
B. Condense
C. Solid
D. Force
Solution: As on melting, liquid is formed similarly on freezing solid is formed.
